item.title: Getting Started
item.description: ToC Summary Accessing Botmon This article assumes you have a working installation of an RStreams Bus. The URL for accessing Botmon and the security around it may well have been changed at your company. This is more for a brand new installation of an RStreams bus. The next article goes deep into what Botmon is, the problems it solves and how to use it.

item.title: Using Botmon
item.description: ToC Summary Botmon to the Rescue What is the structure of data that flows through the bus? How do I find a given event to diagnose something? Finding an Event Text Search Attribute Search Event ID / Date Search Combined Search This article assumes you have a working installation of an RStreams Bus and know how to access botmon.

item.title: Bot States
item.description: ToC Summary States Summary A bot is a logical representation of code that will run, usually a serverless lambda function. States Nominal State All is well and the bot is functioning normally. Warning State The bot is experiencing either a delay (lag) in either reading upstream events or writing downstream events. Error State
